meanings.definition: A room in which work is done.
meanings.sent1: The workrooms in the factory are always busy with workers.
meanings.sent2: She organized her tools neatly in the workrooms of her house.
meanings.sent3: The workrooms were so full of activity, it felt like a beehive!
meanings.sent4: His mind was a workrooms of ideas, buzzing with creativity.
meanings.sent5: The workrooms hummed with the sound of productivity.

meanings.sent1: The workrooms in the building were spacious and well-lit.
meanings.sent2: They stored all their equipment in the workrooms of the office.
meanings.sent3: The workrooms were like little hubs of productivity.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like workrooms, each filled with different tasks.
meanings.sent5: The workrooms echoed with the sounds of work being done.
